Currently 4.34/5 1 2 3 4 5
4.3 /5 (425 votes) Loading... Join in the world cup by getting dressed for a game of football !
Hi there, it’s Lee here. If you like playing sports and sports games like I do, then maybe you’ve already been watching the football games in this years world cup! In 2010 it was in South Africa, and there were football teams from all over the world coming to compete!
Me and my friends Lilou and Lea love getting involved, so we’ve put together some football strips, complete with boots, socks and other extras so that we can play dress up games during the world cup. Have fun playing this game with us, and see which strip you think suits each of us best. Remember to stay in touch by leaving your comments below!
